name: Bike Hike
overview: An educational memory game from Learning Technologies and released in 1985 featuring colorful characters you meet while on a bike ride. The player goes on a bike ride, and as they peddle about in the park they see a number of items, including: trash bins, rabbits, frogs, deer, flowers, and more. After the bike ride, the player must remember which items they saw, how many, and they are graded on the quality of their memory. The player can choose short or long bike rides, and the number of items progressively increases as the game continues.
